channel.title: Highschool
channel.description:
I just started my Freshmen year and its way better than middle school.
Soooo what did/do you think of your Highschool years?

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:27, topic:410537”]My first highscool was Xaverius, ASO (highest level of highschool), the most respected and extremely hard highschool in Antwerp, did there 2 years.

I had a bad reputation for fights, selling fireworks etc., I was only 12 then so…
On my second year on Xaverius College (this is when I got really good with computers and discovered my passion), I received a B atest (you can go to 3 but on a lower level TSO) because my French was bad (total year 40%) and that was really important in that school so I changed my highschool to the second most respected highschool in Antwerp and in my point of view harder than the first one called Sint-Gabriël. Re-did my second year because I didn’t want to go to TSO. Passed that year, but the next year…

I got a B again for 46% of French, we we’re planning to sue the school because my other grades we’re good and because I received that B not for French but for the 3 fights I’ve been in in those 2 years of Sint-Gabriël.

Then, my teacher, told me I know you’re good with computers and there’s this school you could change to that was TSO called IT-management, had advanced math and 12 hours of Hardware and Software a week. I couldn’t believe my eyes, my hobby would become my job.

So I went to that school, 4 TSO but not to IT-management because IT-management is only 5 and 6 and I was going to 4.

Basicly, I had to finish 4 wich was called Handel (“Commerce” translated by google translate) in order to get allowed in 5 IT-management.
I learned a lot about economics there and how the economy works and how companies work. We got 12 hours of company management each week, hated it, but I learned a lot I didn’t know.

The school sucked, only 200 people, no dining room, only 30m² I think, no games to play as in football,… because the playground was too small.

Also, there was this guy in my class that pushed me agressively because I told him to wake up when the bell went off, he was sleeping against the wall, I pushed him back and he hit my jaw with his fist. A teacher came between before I could do anything against him and I wasn’t looking for more trouble because of my past.

But then, he talked shit about me on the playground the next day and telling me I was a wuss and I was the smallest in length in class, I was only 5.4, he was one of the bigger guys so he was trying to intimidate me, his friend and he called me on that day to them, I went there, his friend told me some shit about me being a wuss and stuff, I turned around and was walking away and all of a sudden he hit my shoulder when I was walking away, that was the limit, I gave him a facepalm he never had experienced before, he fell, no teacher saw that, he was intimidated, good times.

His friend that was lieing on the floor stood up, and I told the actual guy that he had luck that the teacher came on time, he pushed me, I challenged him to a fight, asked people to record it, he accepted the challenge, beat him up, his mom took him to the hospital and to the police, I had to make a statement to the police and shit, got away with a school contract. Basicly, because I beat him up, and because I’m Armenian, he had no sentece at all, even though he accepted the fight and lost because he was a dipshit. His jaw was swolen up, black eyes, crushed stomach, one of my better fights.

The fight was a week later after I got the highest rank on our Thaibox club so he had bad luck.

I don’t like to fight, but when people are to dumb for a verbal discussion or start yelling at me, sometimes it needs to get physique because I have a bad temper (when it’s got to do with people that aren’t friends of mine).

Basicly, got an A in Commerce, didn’t get any trouble after that fight happend, any this year I’m going to 5 IT-management (edit: in another school, a bigger and more evolved school) wohoooo.

After I finish 5 and 6, I’ll head of to 6 more years in college to become a computer engineer.[/quote]
tl;dr

jk, great story, i enjoyed it
and every1 else I also like your storys, and stuff, lol didnt think this would get this many posts

Read full topic

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

My Highschool is in the middle of 2 corn fields, and around 250 people attend (only because the building holds grades 7-12, k-6 are at the elementary) With a school this small, you know everyone in it, so you don’t have to worry about not having friends or sitting by yourself at lunch.

Davidi2:

I only really hang out with one person, and he’s 3 years younger than me…

AWWWW DAVID HAS A CRUSH HOW CUTE

Read full topic

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

so far i love highschool 3rd year (junior) and it’s my last “full” year couple classes senior year and 1 college class, then 1 year of community class and off to sweden :3

although i have math 1st period this year, and gym is required in my state -.-

my school is in a small town, but there is about 1k+ kids in each highschool (there are 2)

idk how that work with 20k people in a town but oh well :s

Read full topic

Highschool were the best years of my life. Was just like one big ball of laughs.

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

My highschool it’s I guess, slightly large? We have a large amount of douches… I mean LARGE. A bunch of spoiled rich kids. We also have lots of cool people, though. Just not near as many. So I would say I hate about roughly 98% of the students.

Read full topic

item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

My first highscool was Xaverius, ASO (highest level of highschool), the most respected and extremely hard highschool in Antwerp, did there 2 years.

I had a bad reputation for fights, selling fireworks etc., I was only 12 then so…

Basicly, I had to finish 4 wich was called Handel (“Commerce” translated by google translate) in order to get allowed in 5 IT-management.
I learned a lot about economics there and how the economy works and how companies work. We got 12 hours of company management each week, hated it, but I learned a lot I didn’t know.

The school sucked, only 200 people, no dining room, only 30m² I think, no games to play as in football,… because the playground was too small.

Also, there was this guy in my class that pushed me agressively because I told him to wake up when the bell went off, he was sleeping against the wall, I pushed him back and he hit my jaw with his fist. A teacher came between before I could do anything against him and I wasn’t looking for more trouble because of my past.

But then, he talked shit about me on the playground the next day and telling me I was a wuss and I was the smallest in length in class, I was only 5.4, he was one of the bigger guys so he was trying to intimidate me, his friend and he called me on that day to them, I went there, his friend told me some shit about me being a wuss and stuff, I turned around and was walking away and all of a sudden he hit my shoulder when I was walking away, that was the limit, I gave him a facepalm he never had experienced before, he fell, no teacher saw that, he was intimidated, good times.

His friend that was lieing on the floor stood up, and I told the actual guy that he had luck that the teacher came on time, he pushed me, I challenged him to a fight, asked people to record it, he accepted the challenge, beat him up, his mom took him to the hospital and to the police, I had to make a statement to the police and shit, got away with a school contract. The fight was a week later after I got the highest rank on our Thaibox club so he had bad luck.

I don’t like to fight, but when people are to dumb for a verbal discussion or start yelling at me, sometimes it needs to get physique because I have a bad temper (when it’s got to do with people that aren’t friends of mine).

After I finish 5 and 6, I’ll head of to 6 more years in college to become a computer engineer.

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

We don’t have a big lunchroom. But next year we are getting a new high school next year and its costing 90 Million dollars. We’re getting 3 football fields and subway and wendy’s in there as well. Also getting a bad ass basketball court like the NBA like the thing above the logo on the court its like a scoreboard. But, There not letting us out for open lunch so it kind of sucks. We might be getting Ipad’s to rent not sure yet.

EDIT: There is some good classes for computers in there so I’m happy :). Going to try Graphic Design.

Read full topic

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

My school has four lunch periods too. I ended up with 4th period lunch (which is my third class period since I don’t take 1st period, and is also the first lunch period), which meant my “lunch” started at 9:50 AM. I don’t even eat breakfast in the summer until ~10:30AM -_- I mean it was nice knowing I could get a lot of work for my classes later in the day done then, but cmon, it was way too early Plus i was starving and had no energy for track so it sucked.

Read full topic

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We had three lunch shifts for 3,000… yea…

But as some know, I only went to real high school for one year. Then I did online high school the next year, and now this year I’m going to college.

I kinda missed talking to people in real HS, but I couldn’t stand walking to school every day and having to get up early. I’m also pretty shy in real life, and while I was pretty much on good terms with everyone (and we had good times during school), I didn’t really do anything outside of school with them. I only really hang out with one person, and he’s 3 years younger than me…

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

OmgItsShane:

5 lunch shifts lmao. I got last so fml. Freshies always last

Well that sucks, we have four lunch shifts, and we have nothing like that, we have four sections in case it’s overcrowded.

item.title: Highschool
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:18, topic:410537”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=511820.msg3714152#msg3714152 date=1313529725]

High-School is a lot more drama than it needs to be, but overall, we have a lot more freedoms and I’m a sophomore, and I suppose it’s alright.

That’s the fun of Highschool.
[/quote]
I find it to be retarded.

I started today as well high school is bad ass and huge we got like 3,500 students this year. For a medium town thats really big. Middle school is just SHIT compared to high school. But football sucks ass 2adays

That is a lot of students, I bet the classes are packed with a lot of students as well, I can’t imagine the lunchroom. :eek:[/quote]
5 lunch shifts lmao. I got last so fml. Freshies always last
